response.original_title: Wild Kratts: Around the World Adventures
response.overview: To the creature rescue. Join Chris Kratt and Martin Kratt as they embark on more than twenty action packed Around the World Adventures. Together, the Brothers spring into action to rescue an injured endangered Florida panther and to recover Avivas precious family heirloom from the leaping Caracal cat. Plus, enjoy a special extended-length story titled Amazin Amazon Adventure.
response.title: Wild Kratts: Around the World Adventures
